title: Fresh-Air Fiend: Travel Writings, 1985-2000
description: Fresh Air Fiend Whether it is trekking through the icy Maine woods, or journeying to a remote island in the South Pacific where the first atomic bombs were detonated, Theroux serves as both camera and the eye. This collection of essays and articles is the ultimate good read for anyone fascinated by travel. Full description
author: Paul Theroux
